title: Make it so you can't ban preselcted champions
body:
Pretty much what the title says. Here are some examples:

 1. Too many of the blind or retarded people saying "Omg, sry didn't see. I was watching Pewdipie on you tube!1!" 

2. When you get the remade team that bans your champion because one of them wants mid and you to support. 

3. The person who had a bad Yasuo, Irelia, Vayne, Riven or some other champion and bans it, even though you main them.

4. The person who thinks your champion is a "noob" one, troll or just doesn't want to have that champion on their team.

replies.body:
That's stupid. If somebody is *last* pick and pre-selects the current FOTM overpowered champion his chances of actually ever getting that champion are really bad. Somebody on the enemy team will pick before him.

In that case I absolutely want to ban that champion.
This is why such a ban-protection system will never happen.
No. this would remove the entire point of bans and break the game, especially on a competitive level. As it is, riot is going to add more bans per team.
